title: JBM Ecolife Mobility secures USD 100 mn funding from ADB, AIIB for electric bus expansion
description: JBM Ecolife Mobility has secured USD 100 million in funding from the Asian Development Bank and the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank. The funds will be used to supply and operate electric buses across multiple Indian states under the Gross Cost Contract model, supporting India's Net Zero 2070 target.
